    • Constructor Detail

      • FaceDetector

        public FaceDetector()
        Instantiates the face detector object. It will perform several IO operations and get input from your webcam.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initializes the camera and other internal variables.

      • detectFace

        public DetectedFace detectFace()
        Detects a face in the current webcam input.
        Returns:
        A reference to the internal DetectedFace object.

      • detectFace

        private DetectedFace detectFace(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Detects a face in the given frame.
        Parameters:
        frame - An OpenCV matrix to be checked.
        Returns:
        A reference to the internal DetectedFace object.

      • processFrontalFaces

        private boolean processFrontalFaces(org.opencv.core.Mat grayFrame,
                                    org.opencv.core.Mat originalFrame,
                                    org.opencv.core.Rect[] faces)
        Updates the DetectedFace's texture with a frontal face if possible.
        Parameters:
        grayFrame - The frame in grayscale
        originalFrame - The frame in color
        faces - An array of the bounds of all faces that have been detected
        Returns:
        True if the texture has been updated, false otherwise.

      • processProfiles

        private boolean processProfiles(org.opencv.core.Mat grayFrame,
                                org.opencv.core.Mat originalFrame,
                                org.opencv.core.Rect[] profiles,
                                boolean facingRight)
        Updates the DetectedFace's texture with side profiles if possible.
        Parameters:
        grayFrame - The frame in grayscale
        originalFrame - The frame in color
        profiles - An array of the bounds of all profiles that have been detected.
        facingRight - True if the profiles are facing right, false otherwise
        Returns:
        True if the texture has been updated, false otherwise.

      • searchForEyes

        private float[][] searchForEyes(org.opencv.core.Mat greyFaceSubMat,
                                org.opencv.core.Rect detectedFace)
        Searches for the eyes in a detected face.
        Parameters:
        greyFaceSubMat -
        detectedFace -
        Returns:
        An array of the coordinates of all eyes in the detected face (relative the the detected face) in the format of {x, y, width, height}

      • releaseCamera

        public void releaseCamera()
        Releases the webcam which was being used to detect faces.

      • toBufferedImage

        public java.awt.Image toBufferedImage(org.opencv.core.Mat m)
        Converts the Mat object to an Image object so that it can be encapsulated by a PImage to work with processing. Found at: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15670933/opencv-java-load-image-to-gui All credit to dannyxyz22 at Stack Overflow.

      • getFrame

        public processing.core.PImage getFrame()
        Returns the current camera frame as a PImage
